editorialDecl.p: The published edition from which this e-text was transcribed is printed in the Devanāgarī script. The electronic text below is in a lossless transliteration using the Latin alphabet. The transliteration scheme used is the IAST (The International Alphabet of Sanskrit Transliteration). IAST differs in small ways from ISO 15919, but is preferred by most working Sanskrit scholars. Conversion of this file to ISO 15919 can be achieved by performing the following replacements throughout the file: ṛ -> r̥ and ṃ -> ṁ
Diaereses are used to differentiate disyllabic aï and aü from monosyllabic ai and au.

div.head: paḍhumo āsāsao

lg.l: guppantī vivalāā galia vva thaṇaṃsue mahāsura-lacchī
riṭṭhassa visama-valiaṃ kaṇṭhaṃ dukkheṇa jīviaṃ bolīṇaṃ
ummūlanteṇa dumaṃ pāroho vva khuḍio mahendassa jaso
vevaï jassa saviḍiaṃ valiuṃ mahaï pulaāia-tthaṇa-alasaṃ
metti vva pamuha-rasiā ṇivvoḍhuṃ hoi dukkaraṃ kavva-kahā
parivaḍḍhaï viṇṇāṇaṃ saṃbhāvijjaï jaso viḍhappanti guṇā
suvvaï suurisa-cariaṃ kiṃ taṃ jeṇa ṇa haranti kavvālāvā
icchāi va dhaṇariddhī jovvaṇa-laddha vva āhiāīa sirī
kaha kaha vi dāsarahiṇo jaa-kesari-païjaro gao ghaṇa-samao
sahio gajjia-saddo taha vi hu se ṇatthi jīvie āsaṅgho
sattacchaāṇa gandho laggaï khalaï hiae kalambāmoo
kalahaṃsāṇa kala-rao ṭhāi ṇa saṃṭhāi pariṇaaṃ sihi-viruaṃ
somme saraassa ure mottāvali-vibbhamaṃ vahanti ṇisāo
khuḍiuppaïa-muṇālaṃ daṭṭhūṇa piaṃ va siḍhila-valaaṃ ṇaliṇiṃ
mahuari-mahurullāvaṃ mahumaa-ambaṃ muhaṃ va gheppaï kamalaṃ
raï-ara-cumbijjantaṃ ṇa ṇiattei ṇaliṇī muhaṃ miva kamalaṃ
jhijjaï jhīṇā vi taṇū aṭṭhia-bāhaṃ puṇo paruṇṇaṃ va muhaṃ
rāmassa aīsante āsā-bandhe vva cira-gae haṇumante
diṭṭha tti ṇa saddahiaṃ jhīṇa tti sabāha-mantharaṃ ṇīsasiaṃ
soaï tumaṃ tti ruṇṇaṃ pahuṇā jiaï tti māruī uvaūḍho
cintā-haa-ppahaṃ miva taṃ ca kare khea-ṇīsahaṃ va ṇisaṇṇaṃ
veṇī-bandhaṇa-maïlaṃ soa-kilintaṃ va se paṇāmei maṇiṃ
ṇaaṇehi dāsarahiṇā diṭṭho pīo ṇu pucchio ṇu paüttiṃ
vaaṇe vimalujjoaṃ dara rottūṇa salilañjaliṃ va ṇimento
taṃ daïāhiṇṇāṇaṃ jammi vi aṅgammi rāhaveṇa ṇa ṇimiaṃ
sīā-parimaṭṭheṇa va vūḍho teṇa vi ṇirantaraṃ romañco
diṭṭhī diṭṭha-tthāme kajja-dhura vva ṇiae dhaṇummi ṇisaṇṇā
sajjīaṃ miva jāaṃ aṇoṇamantaṃ pi rāma-diṭṭhīa dhaṇuṃ
gamaṇaṃ rāhava-hiae rakkhasa-jīvia-haraṃ visaṃ va ṇihittaṃ
soha vva lakkhaṇa-muhaṃ vaṇa-māla vva viaḍaṃ hari-vaïssa uraṃ
kitti vva pavaṇa-taṇaaṃ āṇa vva balāi se vilaggaï diṭṭhī
caliaṃ ca vāṇara-balaṃ calie tammi cala-kesara-saḍujjoaṃ
dāvia-maggammi vi se hiae soandhaāriammi disāo
āloei a viñjhaṃ dhaṇu-saṃṭḥāṇassa sāarassa bhara-sahaṃ
viñjheṇa bharia-kuharo helā-vāo vi vāṇarāṇa ṇa sahio

div.head: biio āsāsao

lg.l: gaaṇassa va paḍivimbaṃ dharaṇīa va ṇiggamaṃ disāṇa va ṇilaaṃ
bhuaṇassa va maṇi-taḍimaṃ palaassa va sāvasesa-jala-vicchaḍḍaṃ
sāsaa-maeṇa bahuso khohijjantaṃ disā-gaeṇa va sasiṇā
mandara-gūḍha-ppahare ajja vi saṃkhāa-lohie vva vahantam
joṇhāe vva miaṅkaṃ kittīa va suurisaṃ pahāe vva raviṃ
selaṃ mahā-ṇaīa va sirīa cira-ṇiggaāi vi amuccantaṃ
sallaṃ va deha-laggaṃ viaḍaṃ vaḍavā-muhāṇalaṃ vahamāṇam
ṭhāṇe vi ṭhii-pahuttaṃ palae mahi-maṇḍalammi vi amāantaṃ
sukaassa va pariṇāmaṃ uahujjantaṃ pi sāsaa-suha-pphalaaṃ
ukkhaa-dumaṃ va selaṃ hima-haa-kamalāaraṃ va lacchi-vimukkaṃ
pīa-maïraṃ va casaaṃ bahula-paosaṃ va muddha-canda-virahiaṃ
dhīraṃ va jala-samūhaṃ timi-ṇivahaṃ miva sapakkha-pavvaa-loaṃ
ṇaï-sotte vva taraṅge raaṇāi va garua-guṇa-saāi vahantaṃ
tellokke vva mahumahaṃ appāṇa ccia gaāgaāi karentaṃ
dhaṇa-riddhīa sirīa a saliluppaṇṇāi vāruṇīa a lolaṃ
caḍulaṃ pi thiīa thiraṃ tiasukkhitta-raaṇaṃ pi sārabbhahiaṃ
mahiaṃ pi aṇoluggaṃ asāu-salilaṃ pi amaa-rasa-ṇīsandaṃ
diṭṭhīa diṭṭha-sāro ṇajjaï tulio tti rāhaveṇa samuddo
jaṇaa-suā-baddha-maṇo rāmo palaa-ghariṇiṃ ṇa saṃbharaï siriṃ
addiṭṭhe vva ṇa mukkaṃ diṭṭhe uahimmi lakkhaṇeṇa vi dhīraṃ
pavaāhivo-vi pekkhaï addhuppaïaṃ va rumbhiūṇa sarīraṃ
sahasā lihia vva ṭhiā ṇipphanda-ṇirāa-loaṇā kaï-ṇivahā
uahiṃ alaṅghaṇijjaṃ daṭṭhūṇa gaāgaaṃ ca mārua-taṇaaṃ
mohandhaāriesu vi gūḍho bhamaï hiaesu siṃ ucchāho
ālekkha-paīvāṇa va ṇiaaṃ païi-caḍulattaṇaṃ pi vialiaṃ

div.head: taïo āsāsao

lg.l: dharaṇi-dharaṇe bhua ccia mahaṇammi surāsurā khaammi samuddā
hantavvammi dahamuhe eṇhiṃ tumhe ttha mahumahassa sahāā
āaa-vitthakkantaṃ paṇaantaṃ va suaṇaṃ parumhāha jasaṃ
paḍhumaṃ cia rahuvaïṇā uvariṃ hiaa-tulio bharo vva vilaïo
tumha ccia esa bharo āṇā-metta-pphalo pahuttaṇa-saddo
aruṇo chāā-vahaṇo visaaṃ viasanti appaṇā kamala-sarā
tariuṃ ṇa hu ṇavara imaṃ velā-vaṇa-vaüla-kusuma-vāsia surahiṃ
hattha-uḍehi samatthā tumhe pāuṃ pi phala-rasaṃ va samuddaṃ
te viralā sappurisā je abhaṇantā ghaḍenti kajjālāve
thoa ccia te vi dumā je amuṇia-kusuma-ṇiggamā denti phalaṃ
khiṇṇaṃ cāvammi karaṃ cira-ālukkaṇṭhiaṃ amarisammi maṇaṃ
mā dā deu rahuvaī bāṇāhimuhiṃ ca bāha-garuiṃ diṭṭhiṃ
jaṃ sāhasaṃ ṇa koraï taṃ daamāṇeṇa jīviaṃ kira daïaṃ
jo apaḍimukka-sukaā so vi gaṇijjaï jaammi jīanta-muo
kiṃ va ṇa āṇaha eaṃ kajjaṃ paripelavaṃ pi jaha pariṇāme
dei paraṃ saṃmohaṃ kusumaṃ visa-pāavassa va malijjantaṃ
vihaḍantaṃ pi samatthā vavasāaṃ purisa-duggamaṃ ṇenti vahaṃ
kaa-kajje tāla-same aïrā pecchaha bhue aṇuttāla-same
ṇihuo rāasa-hāo paḍivakkhassa a aveu rāa-sahāo
velā-aḍa-mujjhante aha ṇe hasaï hiaeṇa mārua-taṇao
ucchāho subhaḍāṇaṃ visama-kkhalio mahā-ṇaīṇa va sotto
cinteuṃ pi ṇa tīraï ohuppantī pareṇa ṇiaa-cchāā
āhia-samarāamaṇā vasaṇammi a ūsave a sama-rāa-maṇā
avasāaa-visamatthā dhīra ccia honti saṃsae vi samatthā
vavasāa-sappivāsā kaha te hattha-ṭṭhiaṃ ṇa pāhenti jasaṃ
je jīvia-sandehe visaṃ bhuaṅga vva uvvamanti amarisaṃ
sīhā sahanti bandhaṃ ukkhaa-dāḍhā ciraṃ dharenti visaharā
ṇa uṇa jianti paḍihaā akkhaṇḍia-vavasiā khaṇaṃ pi samatthā
dappaṇa-alesu va ṭhiaṃ ṇiaaṃ decchiha piā-muhesu visāaṃ
ṇijjanti cira-paattā samudda-gahirā vi paḍivahaṃ ṇaï-sottā
tīrenti ṇiatteuṃ asamāṇia-pesaṇā ṇa uṇa sappurisā
jo laṅghijjaï raïṇā jo vi khavijjaï khaāṇaleṇa vi bahuso
kaha so uia-parihao duttāro tti pavaāṇa bhaṇṇaü uahī
cintijjaü dāva imaṃ kula-vavaesa-kkhamaṃ vahantāṇa jasaṃ
lajjāi samuddassa vi doṇha vi kiṃ hoi dukkaraṃ boleuṃ
kiraṇāsaṇiṃ rahu-sue sahassa kira ṇāsaṇiṃ vimuñcaü mā dā
bandhava-ṇehabbhahio hoi paro vi viṇaeṇa sevijjanto
aïra-parūḍha vva laā samarucchāhe udummi va vilambante
ajja vi dāva maha imā maülei ccia phalaṃ ṇa ḍāvei sirī
keccira-mettaṃ va ṭhiī ea visaṃvāiā ṇa mocchihi rāmaṃ
kamalammi samuppaṇṇā taṃ cia raaṇīsu kiṃ ṇa muñcaï lacchī
ṭhāi ṇa ciraṃ ravimmi va vihāṇa-paḍiā vi maïladā sappurise
hojja va ṇa hojja va samaṃ amhehi kaaṃ pi kiṃ uṇa akīrantaṃ
rāhava-patthijjanto uddho dīsihaï kecciraṃ va dahamuho
kaï-seṇṇaṃ raaṇiarā tama-raa-ṇiara vva pecchiuṃ pi aoggā
garuammi vi paḍivakkhe honti bhaḍā ahia-vāria-ppaḍiūlā
visamammi vi avisaṇṇo dhārei dhuraṃ dhuraṃdharo ccia ṇavaraṃ
kiṃ diṇaarovarāe diṇassa hoi avalambaṇaṃ sasi-bimbaṃ
lahuā vi honti garuā samara-muhoharia-maṇḍalaggā a bhuā
dappaṃ ṇa sahanti bhuā paharaṇa-kajja-sulahā dharenti mahiharā
vitthiṇṇo gaaṇa-vaho ṇijjaï kīsa garuattaṇaṃ paḍivakkho
dhīraṃ parirakkhantā garuaṃ pi bharaṃ dharenti ṇavara suurisā
ṭhāṇaṃ cia amuantā ṇīsesaṃ tihuaṇaṃ khaventi ravi-arā
paḍhamaṃ tā ṇiaa-balaṃ pacchā paharehi suurisā paḍivakkhaṃ
aṇṇenti maṅgalāiṃ alliaï sirī jaso pavaḍḍhaï purao
ṇavara ṇa calanti bīaṃ lua-vakkhā mahihara vva verāvandhā
tā soaï rahu-taṇao tāva a sīā vi hattha-palhattha-muhī
tāva a dharaï dahamuho jāva visāeṇa vo tulijjaï dhīraṃ
aṇṇo aṇṇassa maṇo tumha ṇa āṇe aṇāhio maha appā

l.seg: puriseṇa ciraṃ jīviaṃ ṇa a ṇimmāṇaeṇaṃ
ea vi sirīa diṭṭhaā ke saralacchiāe

lg.l: ia jāhe bhaṇṇantaṃ ṇa calaï cintā-bharosianta-sarīraṃ
riu-vikkamamasahanto jampaï vāṇara-vaī puṇo vi hasanto
ia atthira-sāmatthe aṇṇassa vi pariaṇammi ko āsaṅgho
tattha vi ṇāma dahamuho tassa ṭhio esa paḍihaḍo majjha bhuo
jā ṇa ṇiattaï uahī bolīṇaṃ tāva hou vāṇara-seṇṇaṃ
ahiāṇaṃ tosa-hare dhariaṃ malaa-giriṇo hasanto sihare
jāva ṇa dijjaï diṭṭhī kāavvaṃ dāva hoi cira-ṇivvūḍham
aha va mahaṇṇava-huttaṃ patthantassa gaaṇaṃ mahaṃ ṇa vahuttam
ruhira-vasāmisa-vattaṃ hantūṇa va ṇivvuo vasāmi savattam
jatto ṇamaï mahi-alaṃ tatto ṇāma saalo paaṭṭaü uahī
o jamala-kkhambhehi va dharieṇa bhuehi maha mahoahi-majjhe
aha va suvelālaggaṃ pecchaha ajjea bhagga-rakkhasa-viḍavam
sīā-kisalaa-sesaṃ majjha bhuāaḍḍhiaṃ laaṃ miva laṅkam
rāmāṇurāa-matto malemi laṅkaṃ vaṇa-tthaliṃ va vaṇa-gao

div.head: caüttho āsāsao

lg.l: aha paḍhama-vaaṇa-ṇihuaṃ pacchā umhaïa lajjiaṃ kaï-seṇṇaṃ
ekko bahuāi samaṃ giri-siharāi aruṇāavo vva vilaggo
sommattaṇaṃ ṇa pattā harisa-bharentī vi visaharassa va diṭṭhī
muñcaï visaaṃ ṇāaṃ malei aṅgaṃ ca rosa-visa-aṇṇāaṃ
phuraï ṇimaḍhassa vi phuḍaṃ diasassa muhammi diṇaaro vva amariso
purao-huttārambho muheṇa divaso vva pāaḍo vāli-suo
kaa-pesaṇassa sohaï dhīraṃ cia mahaï rakkhiuṃ vaaṇijjaṃ
ṇavari sumittā-taṇao āsaṅghanto gurussa ṇiaaṃ ca balaṃ
ṇa a cintei ṇa jampaï uahiṃ sadasāṇaṇaṃ taṇaṃ va gaṇento
vaaṇaṃ vaaṇāhi calā kamalaṃ kamalāhi bhamara-panti vva gaā
sumirāmi mahaṇa-purao a-muddha-andaṃ ca hara-aḍā pabbhāraṃ
diṭṭhā aṇudhāvantī akkhittaṃ ṇiaa-hattha-kamalaṃ va sirī
taṃ ca hiraṇṇakkhassa vi sumarāmi mahā-varāha-dāḍhā-bhiṇṇaṃ
dhīraṃ haraï visāo viṇaaṃ jovvaṇa-mao aṇaṅgo lajjaṃ
ekkanta-gahia-vakkho kiṃ sīsaü jaṃ ṭhavei vaa-pariṇāmo
tujjha muāsu ṇisaṇṇo hari-sattho pabbalo surāṇa vi samare
mārua-laddha-tthāmo ovaggaï mahi-rao vi tā diasaaraṃ
uahi vva sāra-garuā ghaḍiā vi visaṃghaḍanti kajjālāvā
paccakkhāhi parokkhaṃ kaha vi tulagga-ghaḍiāhi āgama-suddhaṃ
saṃcālia-ṇikkampaṃ aṇuhūāhi vi muhaṃ suaṃ cia garuaṃ
jaṃ sohenti samatthā sama-sāra-parakkamā ṇa taṃ ṇivvaḍiā
ekko paavejja daḍhaṃ miliā uṇa diṇaarā khaventi tihuaṇaṃ
ovaggaï ahimāṇaṃ paḍivakkhassa vi ṇa tārisaṃ dei bhaaṃ
amarisa-gahio vva saro viddāi abhāa-saṃdhio ucchāho
ṇea tume mottavvaṃ suṭṭhu vi turieṇa dhīra-patthiva-cariaṃ
turavantassa ravissa vi maüijjaï dakkhiṇāaṇammi paoo
mā rajjaha rahasa ccia candassa vi dāva kumua-vaṇa-ṇipphaṇṇo
dūraṃ ṇivvalia-guṇo ekka-rasassa kamalesu viddāi jaso
kiṃ appaṇā pariaṇo parassa o pariaṇeṇa de paḍivakkho
sohaï patthijjanto jiāhimāṇassa kiṃ jaammi vi gahaṇaṃ
dhīra aṇivvalia-jasaṃ kāavvaṃ kiṃ tume vi mārui-sarisaṃ
kaha tammi vi lāijjaï jammi aiṇṇa-pphalā adūra-pasariā
paḍiammi dume vva laā sa ccia aṇṇaṃ puṇo vilaggaï āṇā
hantuṃ vimaggamāṇo hantuṃ turiassa appaṇā dahavaaṇaṃ
kiṃ icchasi kāuṃ je pavaa-vaï piaṃ ti vippiaṃ rahuvaïṇo
phuḍa-vijju-vilasiassa va ārambho ccia ṇa hoi kiṃ avasāṇaṃ
ṇivvubbhaï palaa-bharo tīraï valavā-muhāṇalo vi visahiuṃ
diṇṇaṃ jeṇea tume kaha kāhii sāharo tahiṃ cia dhīraṃ
vacchaṃ tamāla-ṇīlaṃ puṇo puṇo vāma-kara-aleṇa malento
uahissa jaseṇa jasaṃ dhīraṃ dhīreṇa garuaāi garuaaṃ
rāmo vi thiīa ṭhiiṃ bhaṇaï raveṇa a ravaṃ samupphundanto
duttārammi samudde kaï-loe vimuhie mamammi visaṇṇe
hari-vaï tume ccia imā duvvojjhā vi avalambiā kajja-dhurā
ricchāhivāhi vaaṇaṃ raaṇaṃ raaṇāarāhi va samucchaliaṃ
jattha paramattha-garuā ṇa honti tumhārisā thira-vavaṭṭhambhā
mahihara-mukka vva mahī atthāaï tattha vittharā kajja-dhurā
saṃpaï jo ccea uraṃ dei pavaṃgāṇa piaï so ccea jasaṃ
tā savve ccia samaaṃ duttāraṃ pi haṇumanta-suha-bolīṇaṃ
aha ṇikkāraṇa-gahiaṃ mae vi abbhatthio ṇa mocchihi dhīraṃ
tā pecchaha bolīṇaṃ vihuoahi-jantaṇaṃ thaleṇa kaï-balaṃ
jattha mahaṃ paḍiuttho vasihii aṇṇassa kaha tahiṃ cia roso
diṭṭhiṃ poḍei jahiṃ diṭṭhi-viso taṃ puṇo ṇa pecchaï biio
to ṇaha-alāvaḍante palaüppāa vva ṇisiare ahileuṃ
dīsaï bhamanta-vihaḍaṃ thāṇa-pphiḍia-siḍhilaṃ paḍantaṃ va ṇahaṃ
ṇavari a laṅkā-diṭṭho diṭṭha-sahāo vihīsaṇo māruiṇā
ṇiameūṇa kaï-balaṃ bīodanto vva rāhavassa uvaṇio
calaṇoṇaa-ṇihuassa a māṇeṇa va kara-aleṇa se rahuvaïṇā
uṇṇāmiaṃ ṇaṇu siraṃ jāaṃ rakkhasa-ulāhi dūrabbhahiaṃ
to jampaï rahu-taṇao samaaṃ dasasu vi disā-muhesu kiranto
paaï-sukaassa dhavalaṃ ṇīsandaṃ va hiaassa dantujjoaṃ
ṭhāṇaṃ davaggi-bhīā vaṇammi vaṇa-hatthiṇi vva parimaggantī
pecchaha laddhāsāā mottuṃ rakkhasa-ulaṃ ṇa icchaï lacchī
diṭṭhi-visehi va amaaṃ uahissa ṇisāarehi vi aviddaviaṃ
candeṇa va ṇiaa-mao kaluso vi pasāhio ṇisāara-vaṃso
kaha ira sa-kajja-kusalā kajja-gaïṃ maï-guṇehi avalambantā
sīā rakkhasa-vasahiṃ diṭṭhi-visa-haraṃ visosahi vva uvaṇiā
aha ṇaaṇesu paharisaṃ kaṇṇesu pavaṃga-vaḍḍhiaṃ jaa-saddaṃ
sīsammi a ahimeaṃ palhatthaï a hiaammi se aṇurāaṃ

div.trailer: ia siri-pavaraseṇa-viraïe dahamuhavahe mahākavve caüttho āsāsao

lg.l: aha jalaṇihimmi ahiaṃ maaṇe a miaṅka-daṃsaṇa-viambhante
viraha-vihurassa ṇajjaï ṇisā vi rāmassa vaḍḍhiuṃ āḍhattā
uia-miaṅkaṃ ca ṇahaṃ ṇiama-ṭṭhia-rāhavaṃ ca sāara-puliṇaṃ
kāhii piaṃ samuddo galihii candāavo samappihii ṇisā
avi ṇāma dharejja piā o ṇe virahejja jīviaṃ ti visaṇṇo
ṇindaï miaṅka-kiraṇe khijjaï kusumāuhe juucchaï raaṇiṃ
jhīṇo vi ṇavara jhijjaï jīvejja pietti māruiṃ pucchanto
etto vasaï tti disā eṇaṃ sā ṇūṇa ṇindaï tti miaṅko
ettha ṇisaṇṇetti mahī eeṇa ṇia tti se ṇahaṃ pi bahu-maaṃ
dhīreṇa ṇisā-āmā hiaeṇa samaṃ aṇiṭṭhiā uvaesā
ucchāheṇa saha bhuā bāheṇa samaṃ galanti se ullāvā
dharaï pia tti dharijjaï vioa-taṇuetti āmuaï aṅgāiṃ
aruṇāhaa-vicchāo jāo suha-daṃsaṇo ṇavara tassa sasī
jaha jaha ṇisā samappaï taha taha vevira-taraṅga-paḍimā-vaḍiaṃ
kiṃkāavva-vimūḍhaṃ ghoḍaï hiaaṃ va uahiṇo sasi-bimbaṃ
pavaṇeṇa uahi-salilaṃ pahāa-tūraṃ va āhaaṃ rahuvaïṇo
osaria-timira-salilaṃ jāaṃ puliṇaṃ va pāaḍaṃ diasa-muhaṃ
roso rāhava-vaaṇaṃ uppāo canda-maṇḍalaṃ va vilaggo
bhiuḍī thira-vitthiṇṇaṃ kaḍaaṃ viñjhassa visa-laa vva vilaggā
taha sommo vi rahu-suo jāo palaa-raï-maṇḍala-durāloo
thoaṃ pi aṇārūḍhe uahī cāvammi saṃsaaṃ ārūḍho
bhijjaü mahi tti va phuḍaṃ ṇatthi samuddo tti dāruṇaṃ va païṇṇaṃ
ṇāsaü jaaṃ ti va maṇe ciraṃ tuleūṇa vilaïaṃ ṇeṇa dhaṇuṃ
jāo aṇṇo ccia se vilaïa-dhaṇu-metta-vāvaḍo vāma-bhuo
āaḍḍhijjanto ccia ṇajjaï paḍio tti sāare rāma-saro
paḍhamoiṇṇa-diṇaaro dīho diaho vva sāarammi ṇivaḍio
uahiṃ bāṇa-ṇihāā addhatthamiassa diṇaarassa va kiraṇā
bīeṇa va pāāle pāseṇa ṇisammiuṃ paütto uvahī
āi-varāheṇa vi je addiṭṭhā mandareṇa vi aṇāliddhā
khuhiā te vi bhaaarā āvāāla-gahirā samudduddesā
khaa-kālāṇala-bhīo paḍaï rasanto rasāale vva samuddo
visa-veo vva pasario jaṃ jaṃ ahilei bahala-dhūmuppīḍo
kajjalaïjjaï taṃ taṃ ruhiraṃ va mahoahissa vidduma-veḍhaṃ
diṭṭhīhi bāṇa-ṇivahe ḍahiūṇa muanti jīviāi bhuaṃgā
gholira-taraṃga-visamo jaha dīsaï sāaro tahea huavaho
vijjhāa-ṇiattanto te ccea puṇo vi vijjhavei samuddo
dhūmāi jalaï vihaḍaï ṭhāṇaṃ siḍhilei malaï malaücchaṅgaṃ
dhīrassa paḍhama-iṇhaṃ taha vi hu raaṇāaro ṇa bhañjaï pasaraṃ
dīsaï osakkanto maggāhutto paaṃ paaṃ va samuddo
vitthiṇṇammi samudde seālomaïlio vva gholaï jalaṇo
jalaï valavāṇalo via phuṭṭaï selo vva rāma-bāṇāhihao
rasaï jalao vva uahī khuhio laṅghei māruo vva ṇaha-alaṃ
hoi thimiammi thimio valaï valantammi vihaḍaï visaṃghaḍie
parivaḍḍhiammi vaḍḍhaï salile jhīṇammi ṇavara jhijjaï jalaṇo
te ccia taha-vitthārā tuṅgā dīsanti dīva-maṇḍali-bandhā

div.head: chaṭṭhao āsāsao

lg.l: mottūṇa dhūma-bhariaṃ pāāla-vaṇaṃ disā-gao vva samuddo
saṃsia-suhoaïvvaṃ dumaṃ laāe vva jāṇaīa virahiaṃ
pacchā a hittha-hiaā jatto ccia ṇiggaā vivalhattha-muhī
hari-caraṇammi tahiṃ cia kamalāambammi tivahaā vi ṇivaḍiā
aha maüaṃ pi bhara-sahaṃ jampaï thoaṃ pi attha-sārabbhahiaṃ
paṇaaṃ pi dhīra-garuaṃ thui-saṃbaddhaṃ pi aṇaliaṃ salilaṇihī
aṇuvālanteṇa thiiṃ piaṃ ti tuha vippiaṃ mae kaha vi kaaṃ
uduṇā dumāṇa dijjaï hīraï ṇa uṇo tamappaṇa ccia kusumaṃ
kiṃ pamhaṭṭha mhi ahaṃ tuha calaṇuppaṇṇa-tivahaā-paḍiuṇṇaṃ
soa-kilinteṇa tume iṇhiṃ dahamuha-vahe sarehi vilulio
ṇiaāvatthāhi vi me eaṃ dhīreṇa vippiaṃ dhīra kaaṃ
jaṃ ṇeṇa paaï-sommā kaha vi visaṃvāiā tuha muha-cchāā
ṇa hu salila-ṇibbharaṃ cia khavie vi mamammi duggamaṃ pāālaṃ
taṃ kālassa ṇisammaü kaha vi darukkitta-dasama-kaṇṭha-kkhaliaṃ
rahuṇāheṇa samudde vālimmi va bāṇa-ṇiamiammi pasante
to saṃcālia-selaṃ kaha vi tulaggeṇa sama-ghaḍanta-kkampaṃ
jatto dīsaï tatto ṇajjaï dhīma-ṇivaho tti gaaṇuddeso
vicchiṇṇāava-kasaṇaṃ diasa-muhe vi diasāvasāṇe vva ṇahaṃ
selesu sela-garuā pavaā pavaesu mahiharā a pahuttā
ṇāmenti ṇamijjantā ukkhippantā a ukkhiventi mahi-alaṃ
saṃcālijjanta ccia aïnti garuā rasāalaṃ dharaṇiharā
ukkhippantesu puṇo saṃvellijjaï va mahiharesu ṇaha-alaṃ
bhijjantā vi mahi-ale oallanti ṇa paḍanti candaṇa-viḍavā
dīsanti pavaa-valiā āvattesu va mahoahissa valantā
ṇa muaï kusuma-ggocchaṃ āsāia-mahu-rasaṃ pi mahuara-mihuṇaṃ
galaï sarasaṃ pi kusumaṃ vāi aṇāliddha-bandhaṇaṃ pi kisalaaṃ
ekkakkeṇa a selaṃ kara-ala-juala-dhariaṃ tulanteṇa kaaṃ
addhatthamiaṃ ca ṇahaṃ addhugghāḍia-rasāalaṃ ca mahi-alaṃ
saṃjhā-rāo vva ṇahaṃ apphundaï malia-ravi-araṃ kusuma-rao
vaḍḍhanti tti muṇijjaï ṇajjaï ṇa muanti mahi-alaṃ ti mahiharā
siharāṇa bhua-sirehiṃ kaḍaāṇa a māviaṃ urehi pamāṇaṃ
vaṇa-vivarehi darīṇaṃ tuliā pavaāṇa agga-hatthehi girī
jhāï ṇu soa-ṇimillaṃ vīsamaï ṇu bhamia-ṇīsahaṃ hatthi-ulaṃ
dīsaï hīrantaṃ miva kaīhi dara-tulia-mahiharaṃ mahi-veḍhaṃ

l.seg: mīṇa-ulāi avi a siḍhilenti jīviaṃ ṇa a ṇadī harāiṃ
avaseso vi ṇatthi timiruggamāṇa jaha canda-ṇāsiāṇaṃ

lg.l: jassa siharaṃ vivajjaï paḍiaṃ phuḍio a jo dharijjaï selo
so ccea visajjijjaï ukkhantūṇa vi apūramāṇammi bhare
jaha jaha saṃkhohijjaï taha taha kaï-deha-bhara-sahā hoi mahī
khuḍiā siharaddhesu a pavaehi ṇiamba-bandhaṇesu a selā
uṇṇāmiaṃ miva ṇahaṃ dūraṃ osāriā viva disāhoā
ummūlantehi dhare pasāriaṃ miva pavaṃgamehi mahi-alaṃ
pavaehi a ṇiravekkhaṃ kao karantehi girisa-vāsuddharaṇaṃ
aha veeṇa pavaṃgā saalaṃ āaḍḍhiūṇa mahihara-ṇivahaṃ
ovaaṇāhi vi lahuaṃ vīsajjia-kalaalaṃ ṇahaṃ uppaïā
ekka-kkheveṇa ṇahaṃ pakkhehi va mahiharā kaīhi vilaïā
ṇijjantāṇa ṇirāā girīṇa maggeṇa patthiā ṇaï-sottā
patthāṇa ccia paḍhamaṃ bhua-metta-pahāviāṇa jaṃ ṇa pahuttaṃ
kaha taṃ cia tāṇaṃ cia pahuppaï kaīṇa mahiharāṇa a gaaṇaṃ
pavaa-vihuesu vihuā ṇivvaḍiesu vi ṇa ṇivvalanti vaṇa-gaā
kusuma-raeṇa surahiṇā agghāeṇa va ṇimīliāi muhāiṃ
āloiā ṇa diṭṭhā saccaviā ṇa gahiā samovaïehiṃ
ummūliā vi jehiṃ tehi ṇa uahiṃ ṇiā kaīhi mahiharā
pavaāṇa uahi-laggo lakkhijjaï biia-saṃkamo vva gaï-vaho

div.trailer: ia siri-pavaraseṇa-viraïe dahamuhavahe mahākavve chaṭṭho āsāsao

lg.l: ṇavari a mahi-ala-dhariā mukkā uahimmi vāṇarehi mahiharā
ṇivaḍantammi ṇa diṭṭho dūrovaïammi kampio giri-ṇivahe
jaṇiaṃ paḍivakkha-bhaaṃ tuliā selā dhuo kaīhi samuddo
ṇa hu ṇavara hiaa-sārā ārambhā vi garuā mahā-lakkhāṇaṃ
jo dīsaï dharaṇiharo ṇajjaï eeṇa bajjhaï tti samuddo
uahimmi uṇa vaḍantā kattha gaa tti salileṇa ṇajjanti dharā
ia tuṅgo vi mahiharo timiṅgilassa vaaṇe taṇaṃ va paṇaṭṭho
pavvaa-siharucchittaṃ dhāvaï jaṃ jaṃ jalaṃ ṇahaṅgaṇa-huttaṃ
taṃ taṃ raaṇehi samaṃ dīsaï ṇakkhatta-maṇḍalaṃ va paḍantaṃ
appatta ccia uahiṃ bhamanti āvatta-maṇḍalesu va selā
pacchā paḍaï samudde aṇṇo milaï paḍhamaṃ ṇahe giri-ṇivaho
paḍhamaṃ paḍanti selā pacchā vāuddhuā mahā-ṇaï-sottā
vihuṇaï velaṃ va mahiṃ bhindaï samaaṃ va dharaṇihara-saṃghāaṃ
geṇhaï bhaaṃ va gaaṇaṃ muaï sahāaṃ va sāaro pāālaṃ
pavaehi uddha-mukkā siharehi paḍanti sāarammi mahiharā
bhiṇṇa-miliaṃ pi bhijjaï puṇo vi ekkakkamāvaloaṇa-suhiaṃ
āveḍha-pahuppantaṃ vīīhi dumesu vaṇa-laāhi va bhamiaṃ
giri-ṇivahehi rasantaṃ ukkhammantehi ṇivaḍiehi a samaaṃ
dharaṇīa sāarassa a ugghāḍijjaï ṇirantaraṃ pāālaṃ
pāālaṃ va ṇaha-alaṃ ṇaha-vivaraṃ va viaḍoaraṃ pāālaṃ
rasaï giri-ghāa-bhiṇṇo tīraṃ laṅghei valaï visama-kkhalio
pāvaï mahaṇāvatthaṃ ṇavara ṇa ṇiddei sāaro amaa-rasaṃ
rakkhasa-purīa kaha ā gamaṇovāo vi dāruṇa-samārambho
valiūṇa bhuaa-vaïṇā kaha vi tulagga-visamāaaṃ mahi-veḍhaṃ
samaaṃ cia pamhaṭṭhaṃ saṃbhario mahaṇa-saṃbhamaṃ ca samuddo

l.seg: kiṃ paḍiaṃ ṇa hoi siharaṃ saaṃ dalāiṃ
diṭṭhiṃ dei rāhavo kaha vi jā ṇaīṇaṃ
tā virahei ṇavara hiaammi jāṇaī ṇaṃ

lg.l: ṇa vi taha pavaāviddhā viaḍa-ṇiamba-garuā rasāala-mūlaṃ
jīaṃ va jhatti ṇajjaï girissa kuharāhi uggaaṃ sura-mihuṇaṃ
dhariā bhuehi selā selehi dumā dumehi ghaṇa-saṃghāā
ṇa vi ṇajjaï kiṃ pavaā seuṃ bandhanti o miṇenti ṇaha-alaṃ

l.seg: rasaï rasāalaṃ dalaï meiṇī ṇisubbhanti jalaa-ṇivahā parīi gaaṇaṅgaṇe kavi-aṇo
osubbhanti mahiharā mahiharāhihao sāaro vi suiraṃ thalammi gholaï amukka-viaṇo
kusuma-pasāhaṇaṃ miva sa-muddha-pallavaṃ sāarammi paḍiāṇa viḍava-laggaṃ dumāvalīṇaṃ

lg.l: vahaï pavaṃgama-loo pahuppaï ṇahaṅgaṇaṃ paḍicchaï uahī
dei mahī vi mahihare taha vi hu dūra-viaḍoaraṃ pāālaṃ
dīsaï ṇaha-ṇimmāo ṇāsaï uahimmi ṇivaḍio seu-vaho
to gheppiuṃ paüttā thoa-tthoaṃ parissameṇa pavaṃgā
dīsaï khaṇa-dullakkhaṃ taṃ cia thimia-salilattaṇaṃ jalaṇihiṇo
ṇa a dīsaï seu-vaho mā hu ṇamejja garuaṃ puṇo rāma-dhaṇuṃ
maïrā muddha-miaṅko amaaṃ lacchī sakotthuhaṃ duma-raaṇaṃ
kiṃ seu-bandha-lahuaṃ jaṃ vottūṇa raaṇāareṇa ṇa diṇṇaṃ
dhūmāanti ccia se ajja vi pāāla-deha-dūrālaggā
taṃ bandhasu dhīra tumaṃ seuṃ ajjea jāva dūrantariā
ekkaṃ malaa-suvelā hontu duhā a viaḍā samuddaddhantā
bhaṇṇaï pavaṃga-purao rahuṇāhassa a pavaṃga-vaï vīsatthaṃ
tuha seu-bandha-jaṇiā mamammi saṃbhāvaṇā ṇa hohiï aliā
khavio pavvaa-ṇivaho daliaṃ va rasāalaṃ dhuo vva samuddo
jīaṃ va pariccattaṃ ajja va saṃbhāvaṇā tuhaṃ ṇivvūḍhā
taṃ pekkhasu mahi-vialaṃ mahi-vaṭṭhammi va mahaṃ mahoahi-vaṭṭhe
taṃ pecchaha malao ccia patthanto paḍigaaṃ gao vva suvelaṃ
maha bhua-daḍha-saṃruddho āiddhaṃ dhuṇaü muha-vaḍaṃ va samuddaṃ
aha ṇeṇa suha-ppharise piuṇo salilammi majjiūṇa saṇiamaṃ
rāma-caraṇāṇa paḍhamaṃ pacchā kāūṇa ravi-suassa paṇāmaṃ
paḍhamaṃ ṇaleṇa ṇimio maṅgala-kalaso vva jalaṇihimmi mahiharo
taha paḍhamaṃ cia mukko velā-aḍa-saṃṭhio ṇaleṇa mahiharo
jaha dīsiuṃ paüttaṃ laṅkāṇatthassa seu-bandhassa muhaṃ
bhamio a taha dharāhara-paharucchitta-salilo ṇahammi samuddo
mahihara-raa-maïlāiṃ jaha dhoāi samaaṃ disāṇa muhāiṃ
ṇa muanti ekkamekkaṃ khuhia-samudda-visamāhaā vi mahiharā
je ccia ahigama-maggā jāā te ccea ṇiggamā vi ṇaīṇaṃ
ṇivaḍanti tuṅga-siharā pavaa-vimukkā ahomuhā vi ṇala-vahe
bhamiūṇa mūla-garuā jahea ummūliā tahea mahiharā
sāara-laddha-tthāhaṃ ṇimenti jaṃ jaṃ dharāharaṃ kaï-ṇivahā
bajjhaï purao-huttā kāūṇa paaṃ tahiṃ tahiṃ seu-vaho
paripelleï raei a samaaṃ ca ṇalo paḍicchiūṇa mahihare
jaṃ jaṃ āṇei giriṃ raï-raha-akka-parimaṭṭha-siharaṃ haṇumā
taṃ taṃ līlāï ṇalo vāma-karutthaṅghiaṃ raei samudde
pavvaa-vaḍaṇāiddho jo ccia uahissa paḍiṇiattaï paḍhamaṃ
so ccia saliladdhanto aṇṇo-hutta-visamaṃ velaï ṇala-vahaṃ
ghaḍamāṇehi a samaaṃ jhijjaï selehi jettiaṃ cia uahī
ṇimmāo tti muṇijjaï dūrāiddhammi sāare seu-vaho
so ccia salila-bharanto thoāraddho vva dīsaï ṇiattante
avi pūraï pāālaṃ ṇa a kuvia-disā-gaïnda-gamaṇa-vihāā
saṃcālei samuddo jaha jaha virala-ṭṭhiaṃ dharāhara-ṇivahaṃ
taha taha virāa-siharo pūria-vivara-tthiro ghaḍaï seu-vaho
paḍaï ṇu ṇaha-ala-ghaḍio kaḍḍhijjaï ṇu malaāhi cira-ṇimmāo
ghaḍaï ṇu samudda-salile ghaḍio ṇīi ṇu rasāalāhi ṇala-vaho
dīsaï tīsu vi samaaṃ ṇaha-salila-rasāalesu pavvaa-jālaṃ
cālei seu-bandhaṃ khambhaṃ āraṇṇa-kuñjaro vva valanto
pellijjanti daḍhaaraṃ jaha jaha pavaehi khuhia-jala-taṇṇāā
ohaṭṭantāāmā taha taha ekkakkamaṃ aïnti mahiharā

l.seg: khuhio sāaro rasaï uṇṇaaṃ ṇa īṇaṃ

lg.l: bharaï va dūrāiddho dhuvvaï va paḍanta-dharaṇihara-kaddamio
rumbhaï va paḍiṇiatto bhiṇṇo ghaḍaï va maṇi-ppahāhi samuddo

l.seg: jaṃ khaliaṃ aīi salilaṃ ṇaīṇa ūraṃ

lg.l: thoa-tthoosariaṃ bandhenti pavaṃgamā puṇo vi ṇala-vahaṃ
jaha jaha accāsaṇṇo uahiṃ jeūṇa hoi seu-vaha-varo
ucchalaï dharāhihaaṃ dūraṃ thoattaṇeṇa taha taha salilaṃ
mahihara-paharucchittā uariṃ seussa je paḍanti khalantā
te ccia saliluppīḍā honti valanta-visamā mahā-ṇaï-sottā
tāhe cireṇa saalo saalakkanta-vasuho ṇiattaï uahī
ṇaï-sotto vva samuddo seu-suvelantare muhuttaṃ vūḍho
taha taha dahamuha-hiaaṃ phāḍijjaï sāarassa salileṇa samaṃ
ṭhāṇa-ṭṭhio vi paḍio muhammi dharaṇihara-saṃkamassa suvelo
hoi duhā a samatte so ccia aṇṇo puṇo puṇo vi samuddo
garuo tiūḍa-giriṇā palhatthanto dumo dumeṇa va dhario
aha thora-tuṅga-viaḍo ṇeuṃ ṇihaṇaṃ sabandhavaṃ dahavaaṇaṃ
dūrattheṇa vi bhiṇṇaṃ sūleṇa va seuṇā dasāṇaṇa-hiaaṃ
hima-paḍaṇotthaïāiṃ ghaḍiāi vi ṇala-vahammi ṇajjanti phuḍaṃ
seu-paḍisiddha-pasarā puṇo ṇa pecchanti kula-harāi jalaarā
seussa tuṅga-siharā uhaa-tala-pariṭṭhiā dhaa vva mahiharā
khambhammi vaṇa-gao via āvaddho seu-saṃkamammi samuddo
jāā lacchīa samaṃ sohā mahiassa sāarassa pasaṇṇā

div.head: ṇavamo āsāsao

lg.l: bhuvaṇassa va mahumahaṇaṃ bhuvaṇa-bhara-jjhīṇa-mahumahassa va sesaṃ
pāsa-ṭṭhieṇa raïṇā karehi hariṇa vva mandaraṃ uvaūḍhaṃ
pāsalla-ṇisaṇṇassa vi uariṃ bīa-bhuaṇassa va ṇisammantaṃ
hariṇā bali-mahi-haraṇe samae jalaehi jalaṇihīhi juante
jaṃ ṇa caïaṃ bhareuṃ taṃ deheṇa bhuaṇaṃ bhareūṇa ṭhiaṃ
avirahia-kula-harāṇa va sariāṇa kaeṇa sāarassa sahantaṃ
sama-maṇḍala-bolīṇo oaraï va jaṃ diṇāvasāṇammi raī
jammi samatta vva disā jhīṇa vva mahī kaāvasāṇaṃ va ṇahaṃ
atthamio vva samuddo ṇaṭṭhaṃ va rasāalaṃ ṇisaṇṇaṃ va jaaṃ
dīsanti joisa-vahe ṇisāsu voḍhūṇa kusuma-ṇivahaṃ va jahiṃ
jattha a gamenti ṇiddaṃ ṇisāsu ṇīsāsa-vihua-pelava-jalaā
visamia-romanthāṇaṃ ei viuddhaṃ cireṇa romaṃ thāṇaṃ
majjha-karālāï jahiṃ tiṇṇi vi samaaṃ ṇirantara-pahuttāiṃ
thoruṇṇae hari-bhue valaāi va bhuaṇa-maṇḍalāi ṭhiāiṃ
jattha vaṇantara-taṇuā ṇavara ṇa ṇajjanti tāraā-gaï-maggā
pavaṇāhaa-palhatthā darīsu jassa a puṇo vi lagganti ṇahaṃ
sevantīṇa ṇa patto tiasa-vahūṇa siḍhilattaṇaṃ aṇurāo

div.trailer: ia siri-pavaraseṇa-viraïe dahamuhavahe mahākavve suvelavaṇṇaṇo ṇavamo āsāsao

lg.l: parisaṃṭhiaṃ haammi va ahaammi vi dahamuhe pavaṃgama-seṇṇaṃ
raïṇā vi aṇacchuṇṇā vīsatthaṃ mārueṇa vi aṇāliddhā
tiasehi vi parihariā pavaṃgamehi maliā suvelucchaṅgā
riu-ṇaari tti sarosaṃ jaṇaa-suā ettha ṇivasaï tti saharisaṃ
roseṇa galia-dhīro samaṃ suveleṇa kampio dahavaaṇo
sura-gaa-ṇihassa raïṇo kaḍḍhantassa ṇaliṇiṃ va diasa-cchāaṃ
diaseṇa vaṇa-gaeṇa va paraṃmuhāiddha-pāavassa va raviṇo
dīsaï thora-karālo uddho mūla-ṇivaho vva kara-pabbhāro
ravi-viraha-milantāi vi honti karālāi paṅkāṇa dalāiṃ
uddhovaanta-bimbe veeṇa mahiṃ va diṇaarammi aïgae
tāva a tamāla-kasaṇo kañcaṇa-kaḍaaṃ va bahala-saṃjhā-rāaṃ
paripellaūṇa a tamo hia-kaddama-sura-gaïnda-ṇihaso vva ṭhio
āsaṇṇammi paviralaṃ bahalaṃ thoantarammi dūrammi ghaṇaṃ
obhagga-diṭṭhi-pasaraṃ savvattha sama-ṭṭhiaṃ pi dīsaï timiraṃ
vahaï va mahi-ala-bhario ṇolleï va pacchao dharei va purao
pellei va pāsa-gao garuāi va uvari-saṃṭhio tama-ṇivaho
viralei samāsaṇṇaṃ ṇīsesei timiraṃ ṇa tā sasi-bimbaṃ
khantūṇa va ukkiṇṇaṃ sasiṇā tama-saṃcaaṃ puṇo vi mahi-alaṃ
aṇubandhanti sasi-arā ghettuṃ ṇa caanti pāava-cchāāo
avaḍicchiekkamekkā visaaṃ phālenti mahuara ccia kumuaṃ
pusio ṇu ṇiravasesaṃ samaaṃ thora-kara-pellio ṇu virāo
otthaïo ṇu samatto sasiṇā pīo ṇu ṇiddaaṃ tama-ṇivaho
khantūṇa va tama-ṇivahaṃ candujjoeṇa khaüriaṃ va ṇaha-alaṃ
hoi ṇirāaa-lambo gavakkha-paḍio disā-gaassa va sasiṇo
occhundaï vīsatthaṃ joṇhā-ṇivaha-bhariaṃ thalaṃ miva vivaraṃ
vevaï sasaï kilimmaï saaṇe āmuaï ṇīsaho aṅgāiṃ
ṇa viṇajjaï kiṃ bhīo o maaṇa-paravvaso vilāsiṇi-sattho
valaï a dūmia-kuvio avasāia-hirisio aīi sarīraṃ
ahisāraṇaṃ ṇa geṇhaï ṇa saṃṭhavei alaaṃ ṇa pucchaï dūiṃ
pia-pāsāhi ṇiatto samuhaṃ aliaṃ pi jaṃ bhaṇaï dūi-jaṇo
taṃ cia kāmiṇi-sattho dūmentiṃ pi bahuso ṇiattei kahaṃ
parivattiuṃ ṇa caïaṃ ṇavaraṃ ṇaaṇesu vialiaṃ bāha-jalaṃ
hiae māṇavaīṇaṃ cireṇa paṇaa-garuo pasammaï roso
alaaṃ chivaï vilakkho paḍisāreï valaaṃ jamei ṇiatthaṃ
saha vaḍḍhiaṃ sahiṃ miva vaḍḍhantiṃ piaamāhisāraṇa-vigghe
vārei cireṇa mao lajjaṃ vicchuhaï vammaho ccia paḍhamaṃ
aṇṇaṃ sahi-aṇa-purao appāhento a aṇṇahā dūi-jaṇaṃ
jampaï vimukka-dhīraṃ aṇṇaṃ cia daïa-daṃsaṇe juvaï-jaṇo
kaha vi samuhāṇiaṅke kaha kaha vi valanta-cumbiovatta-muhe
dei khalantullāve ṇava-vahu-satthe visūria-raaṃ pi dhiiṃ
ṇa piaï diṇṇaṃ pi muhaṃ ṇa paṇāmei aharaṃ ṇa moei balā
kaha vi paḍivajjaï raaṃ paḍhama-samāgama-paraṃmuho juvaï-jaṇo
avalambijjaü dhīraṃ ṇa a so ehii ihuggae vi paose
dei vilāsavaīṇaṃ suhe a dukkhe a pāaḍia-sabbhāvā
candujjoeṇa mao maeṇa candāavo ṇu vaḍḍhia-pasaro
dohi vi tehi ṇu maaṇo maaṇeṇa ṇu do vi te ṇiā aïbhūmiṃ
canda-areṇa paose ṇijjaï maaṇeṇa mahu-maeṇa a samaaṃ
dūraṃ dūrārūḍho juvaīṇa piesu bahu-raso aṇurāo
dasahi vi muhehi samaaṃ āloia-suṇṇa-dasa-disaṃ ṇīsasiaṃ
cintei sasaï jūraï bāhuṃ paripusaï dhuṇaï muha-saṃghāaṃ
visamuddhāia-kampe hiae ullalaï alahuammi vi dhīraṃ
āmuaï mahaï saaṇaṃ maggaï raaṇi-viramaṃ juucchaï diasaṃ
pacchāantassa vi se bahuso hiaa-ṭṭhio piāṇa vi purao
samaaṃ muha-ṇivahammi vi sīāmaïo paaṭṭaï samullāvo
taṃ pulaïammi pecchaï ullāvanto a tīa geṇhaï gottaṃ
ṭhāi a tassa samaaṇe aṇṇammi vi cintiammi sa ccia hiae
jā aṇṇeṇa hasanto gamei ummaccharaṃ vilāsiṇi-satthaṃ
tā dūsaha-saṃtāvaṃ aṇṇaṃ se soa-dummaṇaṃ hoi muhaṃ
suṇaï ṇa lakkhei phuḍaṃ aṇṇa-viiṇṇa-hiao piāṇa dahamuho
kaha kaha vi gamei khaṇaṃ vilakkha-hasiehi kāmiṇi-samullāve
saṅkijjaï vimaṇāhiṃ phuḍaṃ ṇa ṇajjaï piāhi gotta-kkhaliaṃ
kaha vi ṭhavei dahamuho kiṃ ti aṇālavia-moha-diṇṇālāvaṃ
taha sa gao aïbhūmiṃ jaha ṇa viṇijjantaṇaṃ piāhi ṇa ṇāo
ṇa a ṇāūṇa ṇa hasio ṇa a hasiūṇa aṇusoiuṃ ṇa a tiṇṇo
dosu ṇimeūṇa samaṃ ekkaṃ āsaṇṇa-muha-kavolesu karaṃ
taṃ kassa vi soatthaṃ valaï aladdha-suraaṃ mahaṃ cia hiaaṃ
kaha viraha-ppaḍiūlā hohii samuha-hiaā païmmi uvagae
ṇecchaï iarā vi sasiṃ kiṃ uṇa diṭṭhammi diṇaarammi kamaliṇī
abbhatthaṇaṃ ṇa geṇhaï tīraï tihuaṇa-sirīa vi ṇa loheuṃ
ṇa gaṇei sarīra-vahaṃ kaha maṇṇe hojja jāṇaī sāṇuṇaā
jaï ṇavara hojja va vasā lua-rāhava-sīsa-daṃsaṇā jaṇaa-suā
avaso abandhu-lahuo bhaeṇa ṭhii-bhaṅga-sāhasaṃ kuṇaï jaṇo
to ekka-hiaa-guṇiaṃ dasahi vi samaaṃ muhehi appāheuṃ
aṇṇeṇa addha-bhaṇiaṃ muheṇa aṇṇeṇa se kaha vi ṇimmaviaṃ
chiṇṇāṇiaṃ va taṃ cia tāhe ccia tehi ṇimmiaṃ rāma-siraṃ
hiaāvalia-dahamuhaṃ kiṃ maṇṇe hohii tti vimuhijjantiṃ
sīā raaṇiarehiṃ rāma-siraṃ ti bhaṇie gaa ccia mohaṃ
maraṇammi bandhavāṇaṃ jaṇassa kiṃ hoi bandhavo ccia saraṇaṃ
taha guru-soa-kavaliā dharammi paḍiā vimucchiā dharaṇi-suā
ṇa kao bāha-vimukkho ṇivvaṇṇeuṃ pi ṇa caïaṃ rāma-siraṃ
thaṇa-pariṇāhotthaïe tīe hiaammi paaṇuaṃ pi ṇa diṭṭhaṃ
dīhaṃ pi samūsasiaṃ sūijjaï ṇavara vevire aharoṭṭhe
aparipphuḍa-ṇīsāsā to sā moha-virame vi ṇīsaha-paḍiā
taha ṇimia ccia diṭṭhī mukka-kavola-vihuro ura ccia hattho
gaa-jīvia-ṇicceṭṭhā ṇavaraṃ sā mahi-alaṃ thaṇa-bhareṇa gaā
to mucchiuṭṭhiāe kiṃ eaṃ ti gaaṇe disāsu a samaaṃ
kaṅkhantīa ṇa patto vaaṇaṃ maraṇaṃ ca se kaha vi appāṇo
tīe majjha-paeso thaṇa-jahaṇa-karālio ṇa pāvaï vasuhaṃ
mohaṃ gantūṇa ciraṃ samaaṃ bāheṇa āgaaṃ se hiaaṃ
maggaï saṃgoveuṃ alaaṃ tīa vihalo ṇa pāvaï hattho
paḍiaṃ ṇiaücchaṅge appattaṃ cia paohare kara-jualaṃ
sūḍha-hiaāi daṭṭhuṃ acaantīa samuhaṃ kaha vi rāma-siraṃ
āvāa-bhaaaraṃ cia ṇa hoi dukkhassa dāruṇaṃ ṇivvahaṇaṃ
jaṃ mahilā-bīhacchaṃ diṭṭhaṃ sahiaṃ ca tuha mae avasāṇaṃ
bāhuṇhaṃ tujjha ure jaṃ mocchihimi tti saṃṭhiaṃ maha hiae
dhara-ṇiggamaṇa-paattaṃ sāhasu taṃ kammi ṇivvavijjaü dukkhaṃ
virahammi tujjha dhariaṃ dacchāmi tumaṃ ti jīviaṃ kaha vi mae
taṃ esa mae diṭṭho phaliā vi maṇorahā ṇa pūrenti mahaṃ
kaha tā mahaṃ cia imaṃ ṇīsāmaṇṇaṃ uatthiaṃ vehavvaṃ
kiṃ eaṃ ti palattaṃ visaümmillehi loaṇehi a diṭṭhaṃ
vialia-lajjāi mae hoi phuḍaṃ ṇāha tuha muhaṃ ti paruṇṇaṃ
sahio tujjha vioo raaṇiarīhi samaaṃ sahīhi va vutthaṃ
daṭṭhuṃ tumaṃ ti hontaṃ jaï ettāhe vi jīviaṃ vialantaṃ
harisa-ṭṭhāṇe vi mahaṃ ijjhaï addiṭṭha-dahamuha-vahaṃ hiaaṃ
bāhaṃ ṇa dharei muhaṃ āsā-bandho vi me ṇa rumbhaï hiaaṃ
ṇavari a cintijjante ṇa viṇajjaï keṇa jīviaṃ saṃruddhaṃ
bolīṇo maaraharo majjha kaeṇa maraṇaṃ pi de paḍivaṇṇaṃ
ṇivvūḍhaṃ ṇāha tume ajja vi dharaï akaaṇṇuaṃ maha hiaaṃ
uggāhia rāma tumaṃ guṇe gaṇeūṇa purisamaïo tti jaṇo
galia-mahilā-sahāvaṃ saṃbhariūṇa a mamaṃ ṇiattihii kahaṃ
tuha bāṇukkhaa-ṇihaaṃ dacchimi dahakaṇṭha-muha-ṇihāaṃ ti kaā
jaṃ taṇuammi vi virahe pemmāvandheṇa saṅkaï jaṇassa jaṇo
taṃ jāaṃ ṇavara imaṃ pecchantīe a tārisaṃ majjha phalaṃ
mahuraṃ āsāsantī hatthuṇṇāmia-muhī bhaṇaï ṇaṃ tiaḍā
avarigalio visāo akhaṇḍiā muddhaā ṇa pecchaï pemmaṃ
mūḍho juvaï-sahāo timirāhi vi diṇaarassa cintei bhaaṃ
jāṇantī kīsa tumaṃ tulesi sesa-purisāṇumāṇeṇa païṃ
rāmassa chiṇṇa-paḍiaṃ kaha pattiasi dharaṇī dharei tti siraṃ
kaha hoi rāma-vaḍaṇe ia ṇicchāaṃ dasāṇaṇa-dharujjāṇaṃ
mā ruasu pusasu bāhaṃ uaūheūṇa aṃsa-pariatta-muhaṃ
saṃbharia viraha-dukkhaṃ rottavvaṃ de puṇo païssa vi aṅke
aïrā a dacchihi tumaṃ tuha viraholugga-paṇḍura-muha-cchāaṃ
phuṭṭantaṃ jaï hontaṃ chiṇṇaṃ pi kaa-ggahuggaaṃ rāma-siraṃ
kaha teṇa khaṇaṃ mi viṇā dharei jassa bhuaṇaṃ bhua-vavaṭṭhambhaṃ
taha taṃ si gaā mohaṃ mucchā-gaa-paḍia-ṇīsaha-visaṇṇaṅgī
rakkhasa-māetti phuḍaṃ jāṇantī jaha imaṃ ahaṃ pi visaṇṇā
pellia-tiūḍa-sihare ajja vi kiṃ tujjha rāhave aggahaṇaṃ
maliā malaa-ṇiambā thale vva caṅkammiaṃ mahoahi-salile
vutthaṃ suvela-sihare ajja vi kiṃ tujjha rāhave aggahaṇaṃ
to jampiuṃ paüttā puṇo vi atthekka-uṭṭhia-samūsasiā
sāhasu ja ccia paḍhamaṃ daṭṭhūṇa ahaṃ imaṃ mahimmi ṇisaṇṇā
sa ccia mohummillā pecchāmi a ṇaṃ puṇo dharemi a jīaṃ
sahiā rakkhasa-vasahī diṭṭhaṃ tuha ṇāha erisaṃ avasāṇaṃ
ajja vi vaaṇijja-haaṃ dhūmāi ccia ṇa pajjalaï me hiaaṃ
purisa-sarisaṃ tuha imaṃ rakkhasa-sarisaṃ kaaṃ ṇisāara-vaïṇā
kaha tā cintia-sulahaṃ mahilā-sarisaṃ ṇa saṃpaḍaï me maraṇaṃ
pavaṇa-sua-siṭṭha-turiaṃ iha entassa avalambiuṃ maha jīaṃ
viraha-lahuaṃ pi rāhava mae jiantīa jīviaṃ tujjha hiaṃ
tīa ṇava-pallaveṇa va paharāamba-vihaleṇa hattheṇa muhaṃ
parimajjiuṃ ṇa caïaṃ ekka-kavola-miliālaaṃ kaha vi kaaṃ
samuha-miliaṃ pi jāhe rūaṃ bāha-vihalā ṇa geṇhaï diṭṭhī
tāhe kaha kaha vi kaaṃ uhaa-karuppusia-loaṇaṃ tīa muhaṃ
rāma-sira-baddha-lakkhā dhuvvaï bāheṇa se ṇa rumbhaï diṭṭhī
to taṃ daṭṭhūṇa puṇo maraṇekka-rasāi bāha-ṇīsāracchaṃ
āucchasu maṃ ti kaaṃ tiaḍā-gaa-loaṇāi dīṇa-vihasiaṃ
sahasu gaa-ṇeha-lahuaṃ maha ṇillajja-maraṇaṃ imaṃ ti paruṇṇā
savvassa a esa gaī ṇa uṇo māṇuṇṇaāṇa imamavasāṇaṃ
aṇusarisaṃ ti bhaṇantī āhantūṇa paḍiā thiraṃ thaṇa-alasaṃ
dāsarahi tti palattaṃ pia tti sīāi ṇa caïaṃ vāhattuṃ
aṇusoiuṃ ṇa icchaï ṇa dei aṅgammi sā parammi va paharaṃ
bāhaṃ muaï ṇa rumbhaï mariavve laddha-paccaaṃ se hiaaṃ
to taṃ maraṇa-ṇimitte aṇiattanta-hiaaṃ paattā vottuṃ
jāṇaï siṇeha-bhaṇiaṃ mā raaṇiari tti me juucchasu vaaṇaṃ
ujjāṇammi vaṇammi a jaṃ surahiṃ taṃ laāṇa geṇhaï kusumaṃ
kimu jīantīa tume jaï aliaṃ sahi ṇa hojja rāhava-maraṇaṃ
aṇahe uṇa rahuṇāhe tuha me maraṇa-vihuraṃ kilammaï hiaaṃ
cinteuṃ pi ṇa labbhaï jaha saṃbhāvesi taha imaṃ jaï hontaṃ
to dāṇi kiṃ jaṇammi va tumammi saṃṭhāvaṇā mahaṃ aṇurūvā
ekkeṇa kaā kaïṇā kaha hohii aṇaha-rakkhasaṃ rahu-vaḍaṇaṃ
ṇatthi ṇihammaï rāmo aïrā hohii arakkhasaṃ tellokkaṃ
diṭṭhaṃ ti bhaṇāmi phuḍaṃ pattia kassa vi pio kulassa viṇāso
uṭṭhesu muasu soaṃ pusa eaṃ bāha-maïliaṃ thaṇa-vaṭṭhaṃ
suṇasu saüṇe ṇa vaṭṭaï samarāhimuhe païmmi aṃsu-ṇivāo
keṇa va aṇṇeṇa kao pāārantaria-ṇippaho dahavaaṇo
ṇa a taha dukkhāmi tume jaha parivattammi dahamuhassa sahāve
rohia-laṅkā-valaaṃ mā lahuaṃ peccha rāhavassa bhua-balaṃ
taṃ avalambasu dhīraṃ ṇāsaü saṃpaï amaṅgalaṃ jāva imaṃ
hontaṃ jaï rāma-siraṃ eāvatthaṃ pi to samūsasamāṇaṃ
amaaṃ miva ṇāa-rasaṃ āsāeūṇa tuha kara-ppharisa-suhaṃ
saṃbharia mukka-kaṇṭhaṃ aṇṇamaaṃ maraṇa-ṇiccaā vi paruṇṇā
to tiaḍā-vaaṇehi vi ṇa saṃṭhiā jāva tīa pavaa-kalaalo
vihaḍia-vehavva-bhae puṇo vi saṃghaḍaï viraha-dukkhaṃ hiae
māā-mohammi gae sue a pavaāṇa samara-saṃṇāha-rave

div.head: bāraho āsāsao

lg.l: piaama-vioa-dukkhaṃ kaha vi gameūṇa jāmiṇīa pahāe
aṇudhāi paḍiruantī abbhuṭṭhāuṃ va sahaarī cakkāaṃ
atthamaï va sasi-sahiaṃ uṭṭhei va uaa-pavvaāhi ṇaha-alaṃ
paï-lambheṇa paoso jāo diṇṇa-pphalo raï-suheṇa ṇisā
casaaṃ kāmiṇi-mukkaṃ kilinta-vaüla-taṇuo ṇa muñcaï gandho
ṭhāṇa-pphiḍio vva gao rattiṃ bhamiūṇa paḍiṇiatto diaso
sāhenti vihaḍiāiṃ ṇimiaṃ kamalāi diasa-lacchīa paaṃ
jaṇaṇiṃ va canda-paḍimaṃ alliaï vihāa-kāaraṃ saṅkha-ulaṃ
saṃcālia-mahu-mahuro mārua-bhiṇṇo vi maṃsalo ccia gandho
dīho a gao kālo ṇa samā ekkā a sā ṇisā rahuvaïṇo
saṃṇajjhanti kuurisā saṃṇāha-bhareṇa kiṃ karenti samatthā
ṇiaa-balaṃ cia kavaaṃ kaīṇa appaḍihaā bhuā a paharaṇaṃ
samara-turiassa-sukaaṃ kaha mottavvaṃ ti dūmio suggīvo
gahiāuhammi rāme soaï a vihīsaṇo ṇisāara-vaṃsaṃ
soūṇa samāsatthā paḍhamullāvaṃ va rāhavassa dhaṇu-ravaṃ
īsi-ṇihaṃ ṇavara bhaaṃ suraa-kkheeṇa galaï bāhā-jualaṃ
rumbhantīṇa piaame akkaa-uvve vi paṇaa-bhaṅgammi kae
juaīṇa cira-parūḍho bhaa-hitthammi hiae ṇa laggaï māṇo
taha taha bhaïssa vaḍḍhaï saṃmāṇia-macchareṇa samarucchāho
daïā-karehi dhariā khaliā paṇaeṇa pemma-rāeṇa hiā
lajjanti a saṃṇahiuṃ ṇa a visahanti pasaraṃ parassa ṇisiarā
sara-mokkhesu suhattho saṃṇajjhaï harisio kameṇa pahattho
aïkāassa vi kavae cireṇa ūrūsu ṭhia-palambosāre
kavaa-vivarehi galiaṃ suiraṃ uppāa-jalaharassa va ruhiraṃ
sura-paharaṇa-ghāa-sahaṃ suo vi suparicchaaṃ ṇivandhaï kavaaṃ
thaṇa-parimalaṃ daanto ṇīa ccia sāraṇo ṇa bandhaï kavaaṃ
ṇimmāei amarisaṃ paḍihatthei garuaṃ pi sāmia-sukaaṃ
vihuṇaï parāhimāṇaṃ ṇimio muṭṭhimmi maṇḍalaggassa karo
saṃṇajjhanti samatthā ṇa sahijjaï kalaalo visūraï hiaaṃ
ia jā samara-saaṇho saṃṇajjhaï harisio ṇisāara-loo
tā rahuvaï-dīsantaṃ allīṇaṃ cia samantao kaï-seṇṇaṃ
pavaāṇa paḍhama-bhaggā paḍanti samaïñchiāṇa maggeṇa dumā
āḍhattā laṅgheuṃ biia-suvelaṃ va vāṇarā pāāraṃ
caliaṃ raaṇiara-balaṃ khaaggi-vihue vva mahi-ale uahi-jalaṃ
indaïṇo vi pasario ekkuddeso vva rakkhasa-urīa raho
tassa khaṇa-metta-mehā rahaṃ vahanti khaṇa-pavvaā a turaṃgā
dahavaaṇassa suhāvaï āṇā-bhaṅgo vi takkhaṇaṃ ṇiaa-bale
garuaṃ pi rakkhasāṇaṃ aïrā-honta-lahuaṃ bharaṃ sahaï mahī
ṇihaṇanti ṇihammanti a aṇurāeṇa ṇavaraṃ ṇa bhajjanti bhaḍā

div.trailer: ia siri-pavaraseṇa-viraïe dahamuhavahe mahākavve bāraho āsāsao

lg.l: ekkakkamaṃ ahigaā thoaṃ jaha pahara-lālasā osariā
jaha hiaehi vavasiaṃ raa-kalusehi ṇaaṇehi jaha saccaviaṃ
raaṇiarehi raṇa-muhe taha paḍivakkhammi paharaṇaṃ ohariaṃ
rosassa dāsarahiṇo maaṇassa a dūsahassa rakkhasa-vaïṇo
samaaṃ cia aḍḍhatto doṇha vi aṇurūa-dāruṇo pariṇāmo
ṇihaṇanti gaehi gae turaehi turaṃgame rahehi a rahiṇo
jāaṃ pavaṃgamāṇaṃ paḍivakkho paharaṇaṃ ca rakkhasa-seṇṇaṃ
uddhaṃ uddhāi rao osaraï ahomuho silā-saṃghāo
vikkama-ṇīsāmaṇṇā daṭṭhuṃ pi bhaḍāṇa dukkarā gaï-maggā
ṇa paḍaï paḍie vi sire sūla-vihiṇṇaṃ pi ṇea bhijjaï hiaaṃ
duppariiaṃ ṇa laggaï lāvijjantaṃ pi paḍibhaḍāṇa raṇa-bhaaṃ
sahaï paharesu dappo dappa-ṭṭhāṇesu sahaï purisāsaṅgho
ṇiddosesu bhaḍāṇaṃ osāresu vi ṇa osaraï rosa-raso
avahīraṇā ṇa kijjaï sumarijjaï saṃsae vi sāmia-sukaaṃ
ṇa gaṇijjaï viṇivāo diṭṭhe vi bhaammi saṃbharijjaï lajjā
paḍhumāṇiāhi suiraṃ je jīvia-saṃsaammi vi paricchūḍhā
te ccia ahimuha-ṇihaā sura-bandīhi ahisāriā raaṇiarā
ṇa paḍikkhanti avasaraṃ occhundanti jaṇiaṃ pareṇa paāvaṃ
soḍīreṇa paāvo chāā paharehi vikkamehi pariaṇo
jīeṇa a ahimāṇo rakkhijjaï a garuo sarīreṇa jaso
bhijjaï uro ṇa hiaaṃ giriṇā bhajjaï raho ṇa uṇa ucchāho
chijjanti sira-ṇihāā tuṅgā ṇa uṇa raṇa-dohalā suhaḍāṇaṃ
maa-salilehi ghaḍāsu a vocchijjaï pasariaṃ mahi-raüṭṭhāṇaṃ
ṇivvalia-loha-virasaṃ ṇa piaï āmuaï cakkhiūṇa vihaṃgo
vevaï paḍio vi bhuo osuddhammi vaaṇammi dharaï amariso
dei rasaṃ riu-paharo vahaï dhuraṃ vikkamassa verāvandho
sāhei riuṃ va jasaṃ ṇa sahaï āāriaṃ va kāla-kkhevaṃ
lahaï suhaṃ miva ṇāsaṃ jīaṃ muaï samuhaṃ paharaṇaṃ va bhaḍo
daaï kusuaṃ va māṇaṃ vaḍḍhantaṃ pi aṇahaṃ ṇa pattiaï jasaṃ
ṇa karei loa-garue jīa ccia ṇavara āaraṃ bhaḍa-sattho
dhārenti jasassa dhuraṃ entaṃ ṇa sahanti vikkamassa parihavaṃ
rosassa karenti dhiiṃ māṇaṃ vaḍḍhenti sāhasassa samatthā
saṃdehesu hasijjaï rajjijjaï sāhase ramijjaï vasaṇe
mucchāsu vīsamijjaï ṇivvūḍhaṃ ti ṇavaraṃ gaṇijjaï maraṇe
muaï bharei ṇu vasuhaṃ ṇīi disāhiṃ thaei ṇu disā-akkaṃ
addiṭṭha-ṇiggama-vaho paḍaï ṇahāhi gaaṇaṃ vilaggaï ṇu rao
osāa-haassa ṭhiaṃ purao maṇi-pavvaassa va haa-cchāaṃ
kasaṇa-mihia vva taṇuo ṇahammi sāmalaïāavo raa-ṇivaho
raïṇo kalusa-cchāo paḍaï paṇālojjharo vva kiraṇujjoo
ṇeuṃ ṇa caei siā mūlucchiṇṇa-garuaṃ ṇisiarassa bhuaṃ
bhaggā vi bhamanti puṇo ṇīsesaṃ rakkhasā ṇa geṇhanti bhaaṃ
hantūṇa vajjamuṭṭhiṃ hasaï maïndo vi muṭṭhi-ghāa-ṇisuddhaṃ
ṇihiaṃ dehammi siraṃ deho addha-ṇimio mahi-alammi kao
hantūṇa jambumāliṃ jhatti vihiṇṇo aïñcio pavaṇa-suo
vāli-taṇaaṃ ṇa pāvaï gaaṇe guppaï dumehi sara-saṃghāo
chijjanti addha-vanthe entā dahamuha-suaṃ ṇa laṅghanti dumā
indaï-vāli-suāṇaṃ paraṃ pamāṇaṃ gaaṃ pi vaḍḍhaï jujjhaṃ
ṇihao tti hasanti kaī māāi ṭhia tti harisiā raaṇiarā

div.head: caüddaho āsāsao

lg.l: eesu suha-ṇisaṇṇo ṇa ṇīi samaraṃ dasāṇaṇo tti gaṇento
diṭṭhimmi patthiammi a āvaḍiammi a pare sara-ṇisumbhante
chijjaï kareṇa samaaṃ pavae ṇalliaï rakkhasāṇa paharaṇaṃ
pāvaï turia-vimukkaṃ aṇahaṃ ṇa a rakkhasaṃ pavaṃga-paharaṇaṃ
saï saṃdhio ccia saro rahuṇāhassa saï cakkalaïaṃ ca dhaṇuṃ
dīsanti bāṇa-maggā rakkhasa-dehesu se ṇa dīsanti sarā
ukkarisantassa kare patthantassa hiae rasantassa muhe
jo jattha ccia diṭṭho suo jahiṃ jassa vialio vi ṇiṇāo
calio a jo jahiṃ cia tassa tahiṃ cea ṇivaḍiā rāma-sarā
jaṃ cia ualaddha-bhaaṃ kāhii samaaṃ paḍāiavvārambhaṃ
taṃ rāma-sarāhihaaṃ diṭṭhaṃ ṇavara paḍiaṃ ṇisāara-seṇṇaṃ
paramatthao cirassa va ṇivvāo galia-rakkhasa-bhao diaho
samaaṃ cia saccaviā addiṭṭheṇa vihiṇevva daharaha-taṇaā
bhindantā honti sarā dara-ṇibbhiṇṇa-bhamiā bhuāsu bhuaṃgā
rasaï ṇahammi ṇisiaro bhiṇṇamabhiṇṇa-hiaaṃ disāsu kaï-balaṃ
bhijjanto vi ṇa bhijjaï riu-daṃsaṇa-diṇṇa-loaṇo dāsarahī
aṅgesu laddha-pasarā hiaaṃ se ṇavara pariharanti bhuaṃgā
to paḍio rahuṇāho bhañjanto tihuvaṇassa āsā-bandhaṃ
paḍiassa a rahuvaïṇo paḍio aṇumaggaaṃ sumittā-taṇao
uddha-ṭṭhiassa paṇao palhatthassa va dumassa chāā-ṇivaho
uttāṇiekka-cakkā surāṇa taṃsa-taḍimā ciraṃ āsi rahā
hiaa-paḍaṇe vva mūḍhaṃ raï-paḍaṇe vva sahasā tamammi ṇivaḍiaṃ
rāma-paḍaṇammi jāaṃ sira-paḍaṇe vva gaa-jīviaṃ tellokkaṃ
bhaa-ṇiccala-puñjaïaṃ ṇa muaï paḍiaṃ pi rāhavaṃ kaï-seṇṇaṃ
paḍiassa vi rahuvaïṇo dīsanto dei pavaa-vaï-saṃlāvaṃ
laṅkaṃ bhaa-vivalāaṃ ahileūṇa ṇavaraṃ ṭhio raaṇiaraṃ
jassa saalaṃ tihuaṇaṃ āruhaï dhaṇummi saṃsaaṃ ārūḍhe
so vi hao somittī ṇatthi vaṇe jaṃ ṇa ei vihi-pariṇāmo
aha vāaṃ kaa-kajjo majjha kae mukka-jīvio somittī
ṇipphala-vvūḍha-bhua-bharo ṇavara mae ccea lahuio appāṇo
ṇivvūḍhaṃ dhīra tume imo vi uahutta-bhua-balo kaï-loo
kammaṃ imeṇa vi kaaṃ jaa-ṇivvaḍia-jasa-dukkaraṃ māruiṇā
āvaddha-bandhu-veraṃ jaṃ me ṇa ṇiā vibhīsaṇaṃ rāa-sirī
dukkheṇa eṇa a mahaṃ avihāvia-bāṇa-veaṇa-rasaṃ hiaaṃ
tā vaccasu mā mujjhasu turiaṃ teṇea seu-bandheṇa tumaṃ
pecchasu bandhava-vaggaṃ dukkhaṃ kālassa jāṇiuṃ pariṇāmaṃ
rahuvaïṇo paḍivaaṇaṃ bhaṇaï adāūṇa vāṇare pavaa-vaī
ia ajjaṃ cea mae ṇihaammi dasāṇaṇe ṇiā kikkindhaṃ
aṇumarihii va marantaṃ dacchihi va jianta-rāhavaṃ jaṇaa-suā
visahara-bāṇa tti ime vihīsaṇeṇa viṇivārie suggīe
āḍhatto cinteuṃ mantaṃ hiaeṇa gāruḍaṃ rahuṇāho
doṇha vi mukka-sarīrā ṇa viṇajjaï te kahiṃ gaā sara-ṇivahā
so roseṇa raheṇa va ucchāheṇa va ṇisāara-baleṇa samaṃ
ṇīi bhuaṃ va paharisaṃ vahamāṇo vikkamaṃ va verāvandhaṃ
to so rakkhasa-ṇivaho saha dhummakkheṇa sāaraddhanta-ṇiho
bhaggo bhuammi phaliho vacchucchalia-daliaṃ ṇa iṭṭhaṃ musalaṃ
dhummakkha-rosa-mukkaṃ pavaassa jahiṃ tahiṃ virāi paharaṇaṃ
aha paḍie dhummakkhe haa-sesammi a gae ṇisāara-seṇṇe
ṇavari a patthāṇe ccia bāṇo kālāaso pahattha-vimukko
samaaṃ vañcei sare thaei samaaṃ kaī dumehi ṇaha-alaṃ
samaaṃ teṇa vimukko caüddisaṃ pāaḍo silā-saṃghāo
saṃjhāava-vicchurio sajalo vva ghaṇo ṇahammi dīsaï ṇīlo
taha dhario via dīsaï paḍhama-vimukkehi sara-samūhehi kaī
jāo ṇahammi diaso takkhaṇa-baddha-timirā mahi-alammi ṇisā

div.trailer: ia siri-pavaraseṇa-viraïe dahamuhavahe mahākavve caüddaho āsāsao

div.head: pañcaraho āsāsao

lg.l: jaha se bhaa-tuṇhikko bhavaṇa-kkhambhesu pariaṇo vi ṇilukko
pura-seṇṇa-kalaaleṇa a ṇāo calio tti vāṇarehi dahamuho
ṇiggantūṇa purīo bhañjaï bhagga-raṇa-maccharaṃ kaï seṇṇaṃ
jassa kaeṇa paḍāaha taṃ cia vo haraï jīviaṃ pavaa-vaī
sīāhia-hiaeṇa a aha so tti dasāṇaṇeṇa sārahi-siṭṭho
ṇa vi taha rāmo tti ciraṃ jaha tīa pio tti sabahumāṇaṃ diṭṭho
ṇīa hasiūṇa suiraṃ lahuaṃ soūṇa rāma-vaha-saṃdesaṃ
to taṃ pecchanta ccia pacchāhuttā ṇiatta-raṇa-vāvārā
aha selehi tarūhi a phalihehi a moggarehi hantūṇa daḍhaṃ
to pavaāi gaāiṃ turaāi a rakkhasāi lohia-matto
cira-jujjhiassa to se doṇha vi rāma-dhaṇu-ṇiggaa-sarāhihaā
paḍhamaṃ dharaṇīa bhuā pacchā chea-ruhirojjharā palhatthā
ekko ruddha-ṇaï-muho aṇuvelaṃ ṇivaḍio suvelo vva bhuo
sāara-laddhatthāmo bīo se bīa-seu-bandha vva ṭhio
āaṇṇa-kaḍḍhieṇa a to se cakkalia-sihi-siheṇa raṇa-muhe
rahuvaï-sareṇa tuṅgaṃ cakkeṇa va rāhuṇo siraṃ ukkhuḍiaṃ
chiṇṇa-paḍieṇa vi kao caüttha-tuṅga-siharuggamo vva tiūḍo
rosāava-rajjantaṃ puṇo vi hasiūṇa dhuṇaï muha-saṃghāaṃ
ṇintassa a taṃ velaṃ amarisa-parivaḍḍhiassa bhavaṇucchaṅge
khambhantara-vitthārā te ccia vaccha-tthalassa se ṇa pahuttā
jāṇu-paḍiuṭṭhio se jampaï hasiūṇa mehaṇāo tti suo
ṇimmāviammi kajje sāhasa-garue vi appaṇa ccia guruṇā
putteṇa putta-sarisaṃ putta-ppharisaṃ ṇa pāvio hoi piā
kīsa mamammi dharente māṇusa-mettassa daharaha-suassa kae
ia ṇīsi appaṇa ccia lahuanto amha rakkhasa-ulassa jasaṃ
appāṇaṃ va ṇa āṇasi samaṃ samatthassa tihuaṇassa bhara-sahaṃ
o satta vi ajjaṃ cia valanta-vaḍavā-muhe malemi samudde
khohentassa kaï-balaṃ so ccia veo a se paatta-halahalo
ṇīleṇa gaṇḍa-selaṃ divieṇa dumaṃ silā-alaṃ māruiṇā
dārei sarehi samaṃ ṇaleṇa mukkaṃ ca malaa-sihara-kkhaṇḍaṃ
to māāhi sarehi a selehi a jujjhiassa rakkhasa-sarisaṃ
soūṇa indaï-vahaṃ muaï sarosaṃ dasāṇaṇo bāha-jalaṃ
abbhuttia-dīvāṇaṃ ṇivaḍaï tuppaṃ va takkhaṇaṃ sahuāsaṃ
ṇihae a mehaṇāe pariattanteṇa takkhaṇaṃ cia vihiṇā
rosa-visāehi samaṃ hatthehi va dohi āhao dahavaaṇo
ṇīsesa-ṇihaa-bandhū to so ekko vi bahu-bhuā-duppeccho
daṭṭhūṇa a taṃ ṇintaṃ pīā maṅgala-maṇāhi raaṇiarīhiṃ
jatto ccia uppaṇṇā tehiṃ cia loaṇehi bāha-tthavaā
diṭṭhīhi a bāṇehi a tuliaṃ jāi lahuaṃ pavaṃgama-seṇṇaṃ
dīṇo tti soaro tti a amarisa-rasa-saṃdhio vi ullalaï saro
indāsaṇīa va dumo sattīa urammi lakkhaṇo ṇibbhiṇṇo
uṇṇaa-pacchima-taḍimaṃ ṇivaḍantaṃ khaa-vaïṃ va saggāhi rahaṃ
ārūḍhassa rahaṃ se kavaaṃ savvaṅgiaṃ kaaṃ māaḍiṇā
aïrā peccha virāaṃ mamammi ṇīle vva ravi-sue vva dahamuhaṃ
garuammi kuṇasu kovaṃ lahue dahamuha-vahammi muasu amarisaṃ
tuṅgaṃ taḍaṃ ṇisumbhaï ṇa a ṇaï-vappaṃ sama-tthaliṃ va vaṇa-gao
pajjattassa samatthaṃ dahiuṃ addhacchi-pecchieṇa vi tiuraṃ
rahuvaï kiṃ va ṇa suvvaï āṇattī tiṇaaṇassa tiasehi kaā
ṇivvūḍha-jampiāṇaṃ āsaṅghaï tumha vavasiaṃ maha hiaaṃ
kiṃ uṇa bharo vva hohii saaṃ-aṇiṭṭhavia-dahamuho majjha bhuo
kumbhassa pahatthassa a dūsaha ṇihaṇeṇa indaïssa a samare
dasakaṇṭhaṃ muha-vaḍiaṃ kesariṇo vaṇa-gaaṃ va mā haraha mahaṃ
tāṇa a kahaṃ paattaṃ vocchindantassa dahamuhassa raṇa-muhe
ekkaara-maraṇa-garuaṃ jāaṃ rāmassa dahamuhassa a jujjhaṃ
mukko rāmassa ure paḍhamaṃ haa-bandhuṇā dahamuheṇa saro
vea-paḍieṇa teṇa a taha dhīro vi parikampio rahuṇāho
appāṇa-ṇivvisesaṃ saalaṃ jaha ṇeṇa kampiaṃ tellokkaṃ
samaaṃ rakkhasa-vaïṇo aṇṇaṃ sara-lahuioaraṃ hoi dhaṇuṃ
cāvemu a taha ṇimiā tāṇaṃ dīsanti antarālesu sarā
hiaaṃ amukka-dhīraṃ ṇihāa-bhiṇṇaṃ pi rāhaveṇa ṇa ṇāaṃ
bhiṇṇo ṇiḍāla-vaṭṭo ṇa a se phuḍa-bhiuḍi-viraaṇā viddaviā
rahuṇāho vi sadhīraṃ ukkariseūṇa agga-hattheṇa saraṃ
rāmo saṃdhei saraṃ vibhīsaṇanteṇa valaï rakkhasa-lacchī
dahamuha-viṇāsa-pisuṇaṃ phuraï a sīāi takkhaṇaṃ vāmacchaṃ
vāmaṃ ṇisiara-ṇaaṇaṃ rahuvaïṇo dāhiṇaṃ ca phundaï ṇaaṇaṃ
ṇavari a so rahuvaïṇā vāraṃ vāreṇa candahāsa-cchiṇṇo
ekkeṇa sareṇa luo ekkamuho dahamuhassa muha-saṃghāo
avihatta-kaṇṭha-garuo chiṇṇo vi dasāṇaṇassa hoi bhaaaro
tassa haassa raṇa-muhe rakkhasa-ṇāhassa ahimuhaṃ appāṇo
dasahi vi muhehi samaaṃ sihā-karālo vva huavaho ṇikkanto
aha ṇihaammi dahamuhe ūsasiammi a samantao tellokke
vaaṇammi a uppusiā bhiuḍī oāriaṃ ca rāmeṇa dhaṇuṃ
māa tti parigaṇentī ṇa muaï ṇihaaṃ pi rāvaṇaṃ rāa-sirī
dāsarahiṇo vi purao mukko ccia loaṇehi bāha-tthavao
jo ccia jeūṇa jamaṃ diṭṭho icchā-suhaṃ tume jama-loo
dīsihisi kaha ṇu patthiva iṇhiṃ taṃ cea sesa-jaṇa-sāmaṇaṃ
ekkeṇa rakkhasāhiva puvvaṃ avahīriovaeseṇa vi te
sama-ṇihaṇeṇa raṇa-muhe paḍimukkaṃ ṇavara kumbhaaṇṇeṇa tuhaṃ
patthiva tumaṃ muanto sama-suha-dukkhehi bandhavehi amukkaṃ
jaï haṃ dhamma-pahāṇo dhamma-pahāṇāṇa ko gaṇijjaü purao
pacchā para-loa-gaaṃ chivāmi sīsammi mehaṇāaṃ ca suaṃ
suggīveṇa vi diṭṭho paccuvaārassa sāarassa va anto
ghettūṇa jaṇaa-taṇaaṃ kañcaṇa-laṭṭhiṃ va huavahammi visuddhaṃ
patto puriṃ rahuvaī kāuṃ bharahassa sapphalaṃ aṇurāaṃ

div.trailer: ia siri-pavaraseṇa-viraïe kālidāsa-kae dahamuhavahe mahākavve pañcaraho āsāsao parisamatto

lg.l: hasiūṇa mukka-salilo ekka-kareṇa ṇiamañjalī jeṇa kao
garue vi samara-kajje viasanti ccia rasaṃ lihanti samatthā
baddha-pphalammi kusume bolīṇo hoi mahuarāṇa avasaro
palaa-ghaṇehi va khubbhaï vevaï uppāa-māruehi va uahī
khaa-sūrehi va jhijjaï rasaï sarehi tiasehi va mahijjanto
paḍaï va purao-huttaṃ ṭaṅka-ccheammi seu-bandhassa muhaṃ
bajjhantammi samudde soūṇa vi kalaalaṃ mahā-kaï-seṇṇaṃ
vikkhitta-kiraṇa-hāraṃ candaṃ ṇava-jovvaṇe thaṇaṃ va malentaṃ
